Student Centers     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Centers      Student Centers   Main Menu    About Us           Contact Us    Hours & Locations    Policies    Staff Directory         Services           Lockers    Bicycle Repair         Dining           Student Center East    Student Center West    Student Services Building    Alternate Campus Dining         Reservations    Bookstore    Bowling & Billiards           Hours    Rates and Reservations    Specials          Eyebrow menu    Policies    Sustainability    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Be Here            Be Here  Are you looking for a great, peaceful place to meet new people, a quiet place to study or some place to sit down and check your emails?  The Student Centers offers several lounge spaces for you to kick back, unwind and enjoy some rest and relaxation.  Fromplaces like the East Terrace that will provide you with a beautiful view of the city; or the West Patio showing off the Quad, any one of our lounge spaces will offer comfort and community building.
